name: The Arrrtorney
description:
**Note—Due to seemingly unfixable nonsense, the game might freeze when you dig, preventing you from seeing the ending sequence. If this happens, follow the link below to see the end.**

https://the-hottest-pocket.itch.io/arrrtorney-win-...

Explore islands, sail around, interact with dinosaurs, and enjoy the music and the sunrise!

The goal is to collect all 8 map pieces and a shovel in order to dig for treasure!

Controls are in-game.

**You may want to lower your computer's mouse sensitivity, since when I put the game online, the camera rotating sensitivity shot up, making it a bit harder to move as you intend.**
